headline: Is Walmart's Blend of Tech Beauty and Milk Processing Rewiring the Investment Case for WMT?
summary: In recent weeks, GLO24K announced a retail partnership that has already brought its LED “Skin-Tech” devices into more than 200 Walmart stores across the US, while Walmart also opened a US$350 million milk processing facility in Valdosta, Georgia to support over 650 regional locations. These moves highlight how Walmart is pairing tech-forward beauty offerings and AI-driven tools on Walmart+ with deeper control of essential food supply chains to broaden appeal and reinforce operational...
